    • importCell

      @Contract(pure=false) @NotNull public @NotNull PuzzleElement<MinesweeperTileData> importCell(@NotNull @NotNull Node node, @NotNull @NotNull Board board) throws InvalidFileFormatException
      Description copied from class: ElementFactory
      Creates a PuzzleElement based on the xml document Node and adds it to the board.
      Specified by:
      importCell in class ElementFactory
      Parameters:
      node - node that represents the puzzleElement
      board - Board to use to verify the newly created MinesweeperCell is valid
      Returns:
      a new MinesweeperCell
      Throws:
      InvalidFileFormatException - If the node name is not "cell"
      NumberFormatException - If the X_ATTRIBUTE or Y_ATTRIBUTE is not a number
      NullPointerException - If one of DATA_ATTRIBUTE, X_ATTRIBUTE or Y_ATTRIBUTE does not exist.
